titles.title: A resolution commending General Peter J. Schoomaker for his extraordinary dedication to duty and service to the United States.
A resolution commending General Peter J. Schoomaker for his extraordinary dedication to duty and service to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends General Peter J. Schoomaker for his extraordinary dedication to duty and service to the United States throughout his distinguished career in the U.S. Army.
